Hi, my name is Shimeng Huang. I'm currently a PhD candidate in Statistics 
at the University of Copenhagen under the supervision of [Niklas Pfister](niklaspfister.github.io) and [Jonas Peters](http://web.math.ku.dk/~peters/). I'm a member of the [Copenhagen Causality Lab](https://cocala.github.io/) (CoCaLa).

### News

* I will give an oral presentation at NORDSTAT 2023 (June 19-22, 2023) in Gothenburg, Sweden.

* I received the Student Travel Award and presented at the [ICSDS 2022](https://sites.google.com/view/icsds2022) in Florence, Italy.
